metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45760 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: GPAC v1.1.0 was discovered to contain an invalid memory address dereference via the function gf_list_last(). This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
